channel.title: Help with some things
channel.description:
I'm creating a project with a blank source and client and i need help with this things:
- How to make working skills - How to change gameframe (377, 477, 562, 614, 718...)

item.title: Help with some things

item.description:

item.title: Help with some things
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay add a button (or commands) into the client that would change the game frame.
Everything is done via client.java [Client sided]
You’re going to want an int, or booleans, to check which gameframe it’s on. Each would require you to have checks where your tabs are, your game frames, and orbs if any.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with some things
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

We need to know more about your source first:
Revision:
Base:
Source:
[hr]
The gameframe would be edited client sided. If you want to just change it, play with the sprites, they may be cache packed so Toms Cache Editor is helpful. If you want to add the option to have more that one gameframe, you need to edit the client and add a switch (whether it be a button or command) and then have it change the sprites. You’ll also have to register the new positions of the buttons, orbs, and such.

Read full topic

Skills: Which source?
Gamegrame: That would be in your Client files in the Sprites folder.
